title: Effectiveness of Gelatin-Thrombin Matrix Sealants (Floseal (R)) on Postoperative Spinal Epidural Hematoma during Single-Level Lumbar Decompression Using Biportal Endoscopic Spine Surgery: Clinical and Magnetic Resonance Image Study
